name: MAJESTY OF THE B-BALL VANGUARDS
description:
MAJESTY OF THE B-BALL VANGUARDS is a sharecart companion game about rescuing your kingdom's prized treasure back from thieving goblins. invade their dungeons and take back your treasure!

it will pick from levels/graphics based on your o_o.ini!

this is a sharecart game! download here: http://alts.github.io/sharecart.lua/

INSTRUCTIONS ARE IN THE README!

this game is meant to be a "companion game" to go along with the others, as it generates based off of values in your o_o.ini file. download/play some sharekart games, and then play this one!

the sound effects in this game were very last minute. along with bugfixes, these are also subject to change!

CURRENT FEATURES:

9 levels...

a couple of heads/colors for your character...

different colors of tiles...

all based off of the o_o.ini.

LOOPING:

looping will restart the game, and mangle most of the ini file to choose a new set of levels. however, it does keep your score! looping is how you get the highest scores you can.

tip: press ctrl + p to take a screenshot to share your score (or anything else!)

BUG HUNTING:

detail any bugs you encounter in this google doc! there's probably tons of them!
